name: Base Case (Soft Landing)
description: Gradual cooling of inflation, stable spreads.

name: Energy Crisis (Strait Closure)
description: Oil spikes to $150/bbl. Transport and Industrials margin crush.

name: Global Cloud Outage
description: Systemic failure of major cloud providers. Tech and FinOps paralysis.

name: Commercial Real Estate Bust
description: Urban office values down 40%. Regional banking stress.

name: Hyper-Agentic Boom (2026)
description: Productivity shock from Sovereign AI. Tech and Energy outperform. Deflationary growth.

name: Stagflation Spiral
description: Wage-price spiral + supply shocks. High inflation, low growth. Worst for Consumer/Tech.

name: Quantum Decryption Event
description: Post-quantum cryptography failure. Banking and Health records exposed.

name: AI Bubble Burst
description: CAPEX ROI disappointment triggers massive tech selloff.

name: Global Supply Chain Collapse
description: Trade war escalation closes major shipping lanes.

name: Jan 30 Liquidity Event (2026)
description: Synchronized liquidation event: Stocks, Gold, Crypto crash. Microsoft -10%, Gold -8%. Liquidity preference dominates.
